amendment.description: At the end of division H (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. XX. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to establish or collect tolls on Interstate Route 80 in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit funds to be used for establishing or collecting tolls on I-80 in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (PA) amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (PA) amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Thompson (PA).
